Interface RenderConfig.XMLRenderingOptions

All Superinterfaces:
RenderConfig.AdditionalRenderingOptions
Enclosing class:
RenderConfig
public static non-sealed interface RenderConfig.XMLRenderingOptions extends RenderConfig.AdditionalRenderingOptions
Additional options passed to an XML renderer. Some options might be ignored for some content.
Since:
1.11.0
Author:
Michael J. Simons
